properties.title: Swiss Holiday Park Morschach
properties.abstract: Swiss Holiday Park is not only a wellness oasis boasting Roman-Irish spas, an expansive sauna landscape and a water park, but also offers a generous selection of massage, cosmetics and beauty treatments.
properties.description:
Swiss Holiday Park is the largest holiday and leisure resort in Switzerland. Located above Lake Lucerne in idyllic Morschach and surrounded by a breathtaking mountain panorama, Swiss Holiday Park combines holiday and leisure under one roof.

Featuring an indoor and outdoor pool, two flumes, water features, a whirlpool and a large splash zone with kiddie pool and slides, bathing in the sizeable water park is simply fun for the whole family.
The sauna landscape and Roman-Irish spas are ideal for relaxing in a serene atmosphere. 

For children aged 2 years or older, the cr√®che in TOM's Happy Club is the perfect meeting place. An engaging programme and daily care and supervision ensure that parents also have time for themselves.

The range of sporting activities at Swiss Holiday Park comprises fitness training, bowling, pool, table tennis, badminton, squash and a climbing wall. Outdoor activities are also available in the form of a mini-golf course and outdoor carting circuit.
